activities:
BlueModus acts in the role of eCRM administrator. As an eCRM administrator BlueModus processes data in order to manage and administer competitions, marketing campaigns, consumer feedback, events, consumer opt-in/opt-out, consumer sign-up and account information, setting and managing consumer records and passwords, data de-duplication, creating consumer profiles and preferences, viewing marketing campaign statistics, sending emails to opt-in consumers on marketing campaigns.  
Occasionally BlueModus may export data to third parties who have been AUTHORIZED BY DATA EXPORTER (and who will have data protection obligations imposed upon them) for carrying out processing operations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: medical data and off-line on-line manually processed data
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program)
